item.description:
Come join me on 10/23,( 7PM-12AM )Saturday night to see live a group of female impersonators such as -Liza Minnelli, Tina Turner, Celine Dion, Judy Garland, Lady GaGa, and Cher. Past performances have brought great reviews on this yearly show, laugh until it hurts, Tickets are 15.00, reserving tables of 10 and more alcoholic beverages are served, bring your own munchies.

FUN HAPPENINGS--Halloween Costumes are optional, prizes for costumes!!!!
Raffles 50/50 1/2 goes to you the other half go towards Charity To be announced at the PARTY!!!!!

To all the Yes people on this list mention DODY when you buy your ticket at the door, there is a 5.00 savings, tickets at the door to the public are 20.00 , I was informed of this today 10/22/10, any questions direct them to Dody 978-551-1816.

Show starts at 8 PM it is suggested that you get your drinks etc. and be at your table by 7:30 because it gets really busy and the opening show is a blast!!!!!!!!!!!!!!
item.how_to_find_us: Meet Up signs will be posted on the table

group.name: Fun in So. NH and Merrimack Valley

item.name: Featuring the "California Dolls" Live Female New RSVP Deadline 10/22/10
